services.name: Aromatherapy Facial
description: Massage with Jojoba Oil – face, neck, and shoulders

services.name: Ultrasonic Facial
description: Massage with Jojoba Oil - face, neck, and shoulders

services.name: Eye Contour Treatment
description: An intensive eye contour treatment to fade dark circles, reduce puffiness, diminish fine lines, and decongest the eyelids, creating a feeling of relaxation around the eyes.

services.name: Herbal C-Peel
description: Get ready for new skin in just a few days with an all-natural peeling method to exfoliate, renew, and regenerate the skin!

services.name: G.M. Collin Derm Renewal Clinical Peel
description: A deep exfoliation treatment that brightens complexion and promotes skin renewal, evening out blotches and discolorations.

services.name: G.M. Collin Botinol (Botox-like) Effect
description: A four step treatment that reduces superficial lines and deep wrinkles
Using collagen and vegetal filling spheres, this relaxing treatment plumps and redensifies skin for a rejuvenated appearance

services.name: G.M. Collin Collagen 90-II Treatment
description: An anti-aging treatment that combines a pure collagen sheet with other active ingredients to provide intensive hydration, cellular regeneration, and epidermal renewal.

services.name: Intensive Whitening Treatment
description: A highly efficient exfoliating and anti-pigmentation cure combined with anti-aging effect.

services.name: G.M. Collin SEA C-Spa Treatment
description: An anti-aging treatment that instantly restores the skin's youthful appearance for long-lasting effects on lines, wrinkles, and for a radiant complexion
This treatment rejuvenates the skin by stimulating collagen and elastin synthesis needed to regain suppleness and elasticity

services.name: O2 Oxygen Rejuvenation Infusion
description: This therapeutic treatment stimulates regeneration of new cells and the production of elastin and collagen and plumps the skin surface to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

services.name: Meridian Facial
description: Caress and sculpt your facial contours, neck, and scalp with the ridges, valleys, and peaks of the jade recontouring tool.

services.name: Paraffin Hand Treatment
description: Paraffin mask to seal in moisture

services.name: Paraffin Foot Treatment
description: Paraffin mask to seal in moisture

services.name: Scalp Treatment
description: A relaxing aromatherapy scalp massage focused on acupressure points

categories.name: Multipeel Microdermabrasion
categories.description: Microdermabrasion is the most effective way to safely exfoliate the skin in a controlled manner without laser or chemicals. Exfoliation leaves a smoother texture, producing softer, younger looking skin. These improvements steadily increase with each treatment.

categories.name: Waxing Treatments
categories.description: Waxing services are not recommended for those taking Retin-A, Accutane, or any antibiotics due to potential skin sensitivity problems.

services.name: Aroma-Marine Aromatic Back Facial
description: This is a refreshing service for both men and women to promote a healthy and clear skin
The combination of active ingredients will work to minimize pores and detoxify the skin on the back, leaving fresh, radiant, and bright skin

services.name: Sea Salt Body Buffing
description: Mineral sea salt is mixed with essential oils to deeply cleanse, exfoliate, and invigorate the skin.

services.name: Aroma – Hot Oil Body Wrap
description: This is a relaxing treatment with warm oils specially blended to suit your needs, followed by body wrapping in a warm thermal blanket to further increase penetration
Your skin will feel soft, smooth, and hydrated

services.name: Dead Sea Mineral Mud Body Wrap
description: Mineral-rich healing mud is beneficial in detoxifying and purifying our entire body.

services.name: Aromatherapy Body Relaxing Treatment
description: A relaxing massage experience applied with special aroma recipe of essential oils which hydrates, tones, revitalizes, and heals the entire body.

services.name: Hot Stone Therapy Treatment
description: The heat within the stones penetrates your body to provide you with a deeply relaxing experience.
